column5: I dont have the regs handy right now.Are they open season?Probably not!Any info would be greatly appreciated.Specific area, below dennys Dam.I know trouts closed between there and the ambuncments.Are Pike?
The Saugeen isn't Georgian Bay, but yes it and Geo Bay are closed for pike.
I don't believe there are pike in that part of the Saugeen either.  I've only seen musky there...  I guess there very well could be pike though.
The one I caught by accident while trout fishin,sure looked like a pike.And it was huge, the biggest Ive ever seen.They tend to pool up on the reserve side of the dam.
